example.parse: (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اقتراح) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP رامسفيلد)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC نشر) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نظام) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مراقبة)))) (PP-LOC (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN خط) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الهدنة)))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مراقبة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تسلل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الاسلاميين)))))))))

arg.g: installing a monitoring system on the armistice line

example.arg: نشر نظام مراقبة على خط الهدنة
